title: Looking For Ranked Partner: Platinum III Jungler (Coming off recent divorce with Udyr)
body:
Hey all, I'm looking for a ranked solo/duo and flex partner.

I'm currently Platinum III, I used to one-trick Udyr however he's been indirectly nerfed 1 billion times so I'm trying out new things, J4 is my current go-to. I'm still relatively new and pretty braindead, so having someone to play with would make things a bit easier.

So yeah, feel free to add me on 'Rilez' if you're keen to play and get some wins.
